DOCPX_INPUT¶

The input path

DOCPX_OUTPUT¶

Output path for the docs

DOCPX_DEBUG¶

Enable Debug mode producing a more verbose processing.

DOCPX_VERSION¶

Current version of phpdocpx

DOCPX_MASTERMIND¶

Docpx mastermind

VERBOSE¶

Set to true to output all activity

VALIDATE¶

Set to true to enable syntax error checking of files before parsing the source.

RECURSIVE¶

Set to true to enable recursively scanning directories for files

COLORS¶

Set to true to enable color output in the console based on the message type.

EXTENSION¶

File extensions to include

EXCLUDE_DIR¶

Directory Names to omit from inclusion separate with ”,”

IGNORE_TAG¶

Allow support for when a @ignore tag is encountered docpx will ignore documentation of the next element.

HAS_LICENSE_DOC¶

Sets to have the first docblock in a file found to be parsed as the license doc. Note that the first comment encountered will be considered the license doc for the file and the second will be considered the file doc.

EXCLUDE_PRIVATE¶

Flag to indicate exlusion of private class members

DOCPX_PARAM_NO_DEFAULT¶

Parameter no default value

WINDOWS¶

Using Windows

WINDOWS¶
